sentences.sContent: Many famous people have stayed in the hotel.
sentences.sCn: 许多名人都曾下榻这家酒店。

sentences.sContent: The Eiffel Tower is a famous landmark (= a famous place or building that is easy to recognize ) .
sentences.sCn: 埃菲尔铁塔是著名的地标。

sentences.sContent: Da Vinci’s world-famous portrait of the Mona Lisa
sentences.sCn: 达•芬奇的那幅闻名世界的肖像画《蒙娜丽莎》

sentences.sContent: ...and it is especially famous for its sunrise and sea of clouds...
...he quotes john maynard keynes's justly famous words of praise to the bookstore: one should enter it vaguely...
...And they're talking about the British personality – the famous British 'reserve'...
...The competitors had a chance to visit the famous scenic spots and historical sites in other parts of China as well...
...the more wonderful chance will be presented for them to be admitted by the famous university...
...I recently tried to estimate this impact in terms of a most famous food...
...Lijiang ancient town of Yunnan Province is one of the most famous travel attractions in China...
...and severalquoted a famous saying of Maria Montessori's...

synos.tran: 著名的；极好的，非常令人满意的

trans.tranOther: known about by many people in many places
